div.p: This project is a simple XML grammar code completion Netbeans module which gives the user access to basic maven/jelly-taglib elements and attributes. It currently works with Netbeans 3.5.
Currently the 0.1 version is available for download. It works with Netbeans 3.5.1.
To get latest snapshot of 0.2, please checkout the project from cvs. (Snapshot also available on the Download page) It works with Netbeans 3.6 beta.
To install the plugin, go to the Sourceforge download page and get the zipped/tarred release. Then extract it, and install the nbm files using your IDE's "Tools/Update Center" wizard.
